Good Comments: The best out of the other subgroups, however slow.
Subpar video quality, but aside from that everything is great.
if you look at the other groups you should already know which to choose

Good Comments: Best of all the current groups doing this. Excellent quality and speed.
Because they sub an anime thats on CR
Wonderful job. Typesetting is great and the translations are as well. I like the fact that they add status updates before releases.
fast, pretty accurate, and very readable
Plain simple subs that don't distract away from the beauty of the show. Plus, I thought the trumpet music on their site during the wait for the last episode was really touching.
Fast subbing but terrible everything else.
good subs, provide status updates on their site, no kara but it's a speedsub, and even did the German as optional include on a diff channel.
Great subs, keep up the good work.
Bad Comments: clean, simple styling that stays out of the way, nothing that doesn't read like it shouldn't sound.
They're fast and accurate. I'm glad they're subbing this, CR only works in the US.
I'm going with them - good quality and fast release
Great quality of subs plus the availability of higher resolutions for their videos. This is my first time with them, and I am already enjoying it.

Hey, nothing I saw wrong with this. The karaoke could've looked better, but honestly it was a good translation. Good typesetting and no blatant grammatical errors. I'll stick with them if they continue.
Pretty solid. Will stick with them.
